column4: Hi could someone tell me if I am typing in a foreign language please...
* hours in the forums today and no one can tell me if there is a program that will translate some files into english for me....
ok I will try that....
now back to my original question? Is there a PROGRAM that will do it for me...I am not pissed I am just trying to find out if there is a program I can download to do it...
what language(s) are you translating?
did you get that link?
dude, I'm trying to help, did you check that link
I am not mad at you thanx for your help I spent 8 hours in the forums and not one reply i am just a little cranky Thank you for your help....
did you get the msg from Jack_Sparrow
what are the files you are trying to read
you have a program written in c++ (in another language) and you want to be able to read it?
no, sorry wrong factoid
type the nick of the person you want to address followed by TAB
Like this?
thats it :)
Thanx
Yes it is c++ in another language...
now, do !gnome-translate like Jack_Sparrow did for you before
ok how to do again?
type   !gnome-translate
cool man, now stop downloading cpp programs in foreign languages ;-)
